caption.p: (a) Theoretically calculated Pd K-edge EXAFS spectrum for a (b) model Pd 74Au 74 NP, and its (c) Fourier and (d) wavelet transformations. (e) Wavelet transforms of partial multiple-scattering contributions, and those of the single scattering (f) Pd–Pd and (g) Pd–Au contributions are shown separately. Reprinted from ref ( 147) with permission of AIP Publishing.
